pullrequest.title: Allow comms client under a ROS namespace

content.raw: I made some changes in c323846 as [suggested](#!/osrf/subt/issues/143/subt-commsclient-cant-handle-ros#comment-53441264) by @{557058:ba6a5dd6-99be-45af-a802-687b3318965a} and it seems to fix the communication issue between X1 and X2, but now both of them have a problem calling the `pose_from_artifact_origin` service. This is the error I'm getting `Failed to call pose_from_artifact_origin service, robot may not exist, be outside staging area, or the service is not available.`
content.html: I made some changes in c323846 as suggested by @Reid Sawtell and it seems to fix the communication issue between X1 and X2, but now both of them have a problem calling the pose_from_artifact_origin service. This is the error I'm getting Failed to call pose_from_artifact_origin service, robot may not exist, be outside staging area, or the service is not available.
